text:
Luxurious dreams at sea - Veela Private Island resort and Ponant   
Oct 13, 2015 eTN   
Freedom is considered by many people as pure luxury and where could you have this experience better than at sea. How to even emphasize this kind of luxury with excellent service and the highest standards of comfort and elegance is being demonstrated by the private island Veela in the Maldives and the shipping company PONANT Yacht Cruises & Expeditions in the next year during the luxury tourism fair loop in Frankfurt, Germany. Find out about loop at www.loop-luxury-fair.com 
Velaa Private Island is the realisation of a dream to create a ‘beyond luxury’ ultra-exclusive boutique hideaway. This unique destination was developed to embody the very best of this unique archipelago, bathed by azure skies in the aquamarine waters of the Indian Ocean. The name of this private retreat, an elegant fusion of Maldivian culture with contemporary luxury, means “Turtle Island” in the local language – named after generations of sea turtles that have migrated here to nest and hatch. Velaa Private Island has been designed and curated with privacy and comfort as the guiding principles while allowing the Indian Ocean to take center stage. At one with nature, each of the private retreats is built using local materials, combining contemporary flourishes with interiors designed for sensory exploration. Generous terraces and sultry gazebos are positioned to maximise shade, breeze, views and privacy, allowing for total immersion in nature. The resort comprises 43 private villas, houses and residences and 4 four-bedroom residences. 18 villas are built over water, including the Romantic Pool Residence which can only be reached by boat, allowing even more privacy and exclusivity. More information at www.velaaprivateisland.com 
Sailing on one of PONANT’s ships is a chance to experience a different and exclusive type of cruise, and a conception of travel that is intimate, luxurious and authentic. 
As the only French cruise ship owner, PONANT has been firmly anchored in the French maritime tradition for over 25 years and combines a refined lifestyle on board with a passion for discovery. Discover a fleet of 5 vessels which allows for choice. Le Ponant: 32 staterooms, a refined and efficient three-masted sailing yacht; Le Boréal, L’Austral and Le Soléal: three sublime 132 staterooms and suites yachts; and the last vessel, Le Lyrial: fourth sister-ship of 122 staterooms and suites. Each cruise ships have elegant and uncluttered interiors; delight in the fun and casual elegance onboard without the formalities. During the cruise aboard one of our ships, our guests discover exceptional sites and come closed to landscapes so often inaccessible to large ships and enjoy exquisite dining with French and international cuisine. More information at www.ponant.com loop was founded three years ago by the company Lobster Experience GmbH & Co KG.
